item.description:
We will meet at 8:50 pm the film starts at 9:10 pm.

The description says it all: A suburban housewife in 1972 is abandoned by her husband. She goes out to find herself in the middle of of the swinging sexual revolution. Viva is a satirical commentary on the icons of the Playboy-era sexual revolution and a tribute to the best of the exploitation cinema.

The website is a hoot: www.lifeofastar.com Definetely not for kids, not that I've ever seen one at our films .
item.how_to_find_us: I continue to look like my picture

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Viva @ Real Art Ways
